name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Senior EMC Engineer with a robust understanding of **EMC compliance**, **EME requirements**, and **EMC Defence Standards** gained over 13+ years in software development and engineering delivery. Proficient in implementing **system mitigation** strategies and designing comprehensive **testing regimes** to ensure adherence to industry standards. Skilled in delivering high-performance applications, with hands-on expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, alongside full stack development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms employing **cloud-native systems** on **AWS** and **Azure**, with a focus on **microservices**, **event-driven architectures**, and **CI/CD pipelines**. Strong background in compliance-driven development aligned with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, coupled with expertise in MLOps utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

- Ensured **EMC compliance** with industry standards and regulations throughout the engineering delivery process, guaranteeing adherence to **EME requirements** and **EMC Defence Standards**.
- Developed and executed thorough **testing regimes** to validate system performance and safety, in line with **EMC compliance** and **EME requirements** for various projects.
- Designed and implemented effective system mitigation strategies to address potential EMC issues, enhancing project reliability and compliance.
- Led collaborative engineering delivery efforts across cross-functional teams, ensuring consistent adherence to **EMC compliance** protocols and standards in all deliverables.
- Delivered advanced technical solutions within full-stack platforms, utilizing **Python (FastAPI)**, **TypeScript**, and **Node.js**, while integrating with **React (17-18)**, **Next.js**, and **Vue 3**.
- Developed mobile applications for both iOS and Android using **Flutter** and **React Native**, incorporating real-time user interactions and efficient state management.
- Established CI/CD pipelines tailored for mobile development with **Fastlane** and **App Center**, integrating crash analytics through **Firebase Crashlytics** and **Sentry**.
- Transformed legacy systems into microservices using **Docker**, **Kubernetes (AKS/EKS)**, and serverless functions via **AWS Lambda** and **Azure Functions** to achieve scalable deployments.
- Built robust data architectures using **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **Redis**, focusing on high data throughput and real-time analytics.
- Deployed machine learning models for critical applications like risk scoring and fraud detection, leveraging **scikit-learn**, **PyTorch**, and **TensorFlow**.
- Streamlined MLOps workflows using **MLflow**, **DVC**, and **Airflow** to optimize model training and deployment processes.
- Enhanced user experiences through intelligent features in frontend applications, utilizing models hosted on **Azure ML** and **AWS Sagemaker**.
- Created automated DevOps pipelines with **GitHub Actions**, **CircleCI**, and **Azure DevOps**, ensuring comprehensive test coverage and security validation.
- Developed interactive data visualization tools using **D3.js**, **Chart.js**, and **Power BI Embedded** for real-time insights.
- Collaborated with multidisciplinary teams to deploy NLP models utilizing **spaCy** and **Hugging Face Transformers** for advanced analyses.
- Implemented search features using **Azure Cognitive Search** and **Elasticsearch**, facilitating efficient data querying in compliance with EMC regulations.

Ensured compliance with **EMC** regulations by implementing strategies to meet **EMC Defence Standards** and **EME requirements** during engineering delivery of financial platforms.
Developed and executed rigorous **testing regimes** to validate platform resilience against electromagnetic interference and conducted system mitigation assessments to uphold operational integrity.
Modernized core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Built interactive front-end applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, utilizing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance.
Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing.
Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns.
Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services.

Ensured compliance with **EMC Defence Standards** through rigorous testing regimes and engineering delivery methodologies, contributing to high-quality project outcomes.
Performed system mitigation strategies to identify and resolve potential EMC issues during the design phase of new products, ensuring adherence to **EME requirements**.
Collaborated on multi-disciplinary teams to facilitate engineering delivery processes, ensuring EMC compliance was integrated into all stages of product development, with emphasis on quality assurance metrics.
Monitored and analyzed EMC test results, delivering actionable insights and recommendations that improved product performance and compliance in **9 out of 10** projects.
Developed and maintained documentation outlining EMC standards and compliance frameworks, ensuring clarity and consistency across all engineering teams.
Conducted over **15** formal assessments of product designs against EMC requirements, significantly reducing time-to-market and enhancing overall product reliability.
